description: General abstraction details and demographic information reported to the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: MCARE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current Medicare status of the dialysis patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pending


NoCoverage


Coverage

columns.name: MCARE_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the current Medicare status of the dialysis patient.

columns.name: EMPY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current employment status of the dialysis patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unemployed


FullTime


PartTime


Homemaker


RetiredAgePref


RetiredDisability


MedicalLeave


Student

columns.name: EMPY_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the current employment status of the dialysis patient.

columns.name: SCHOOL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current school status of the dialysis patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


School Full-Time


School Part-Time


Not in School

columns.name: SCHOOL_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the current school status of the dialysis patient.

columns.name: VOCATIONAL_REHAB_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current vocational rehab status of the dialysis patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Referred to VR


Currently in VR


Completed


Not Eligible for VR


Declined VR

columns.name: VOCATIONAL_REHAB_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the current vocational rehab status of the dialysis patient.

columns.name: ADMSN_FACILITY_ID
columns.description: The dialysis patient's admission facility ID.

columns.name: ADMSN_DATE
columns.description: The date when the dialysis patient started dialysis treatment in this facility.

columns.name: ADMSN_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for dialysis admission. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New ESRD Patient


Transfer In


Restart Dialysis


Dialysis after Transplant Failed


Dialysis in Support of Transplant

columns.name: TRANSIENT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for the dialysis patient being transient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Disaster


Travel


Home Maintenance


Facility Maintenance


Dialysis in Support of Transplant


Backup Hemodialysis

columns.name: TRANSFER_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transfer discharge reason of a dialysis patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Dialysis Facility


Hospice


Hospital


Long Term Care Facility


Rehab Center


Nursing Home

columns.name: DISCH_DATE
columns.description: The date when a patient is discharged from the dialysis outpatient facility.

columns.name: DISCH_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for discharging a patient from the dialysis facility.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Death


Discontinue


Lost to Follow-Up


Recover Function of Original Kidney


Involuntary


Other


Transplant in US


Transplant outside US


Transfer


Acute


Delayed Function Resolved following a Transplant


Delayed Function Unresolved following a Transplant

columns.name: PRIMARY_TRT_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The primary setting of the patient's dialysis treatment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Home


Dialysis Facility/ Center


SNF/ Long Term Care Facility

columns.name: TRT_START_DATE
columns.description: The treatment start date for dialysis.

columns.name: TRT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The treatment type of dialysis patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Hemodialysis


CAPD


CCPD


Other

columns.name: SESSIONS_PER_WEEK
columns.description: The number of hemodialysis sessions per week for the dialysis patient.

columns.name: SESSION_LENGTH
columns.description: The hemodialysis session length.

columns.name: TRT_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The dialysis patient's treatment provider's ID.

columns.name: IS_TRANSIENT_YN
columns.description:
Shows whether the dialysis patient is transient or not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: TRAINING_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of training obtained by dialysis patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TRT_TYPE_C_NAME

columns.name: OTHER_TRAINING_TYPE
columns.description: The type of training type if not in the list of common types.

columns.name: TRAINING_TIME_OF_DAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The information on whether the patient obtained training for day or nocturnal dialysis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Day


Nocturnal

columns.name: TRAINING_START_DATE
columns.description: The training start date for the dialysis patient.

columns.name: TRAINING_END_DATE
columns.description: The training end date for the dialysis patient.

columns.name: SELFCARE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Shows whether the dialysis patient is expected to perform self-care at home or in-center after dialysis training.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Home


Incenter

columns.name: NO_CLINICAL_DATA_YN
columns.description:
Shows whether the dialysis patient's monthly clinical submission information is available or not.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_TRANSIENT_YN

columns.name: EQRS_IDENT
columns.description: The dialysis patient's End Stage Renal Disease Quality Reporting System (EQRS) ID used in CMS reporting.

columns.name: ADMISSION_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Unique identifier for dialysis admission.

columns.name: TREATMENT_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: It stores the dialysis treatment modality ID of a patient.

columns.name: PAT_FIRST_NAME
columns.description: It stores the dialysis patient's first name.

columns.name: PAT_MIDDLE_INITIAL
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's middle name initial.

columns.name: PAT_LAST_NAME
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's last name.

columns.name: PAT_NAME_SUFFIX_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's name suffix.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Jr


Sr


II


III


IV


V


VI

columns.name: PAT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the dialysis patient's sex assigned at birth.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


F


M

columns.name: PAT_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's date of birth.

columns.name: PAT_DEATH_DATE
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's date of death.

columns.name: PAT_MBI_NUM
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's Medicare Beneficiary Identifier number.

columns.name: PAT_SSN
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's social security number.

columns.name: PHYS_ADDRESS_STREET_1
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's physical address street line 1.

columns.name: PHYS_ADDRESS_STREET_2
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's physical address street line 2.

columns.name: PHYS_ADDRESS_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's physical address state.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PHYS_ADDRESS_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's physical address county.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PHYS_ADDRESS_ZIP
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's ZIP code.

columns.name: PHYS_ADDRESS_ZIP_EXT
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's physical address ZIP extension.

columns.name: MAIL_ADDRESS_STREET_1
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's mailing address street line 1.

columns.name: MAIL_ADDRESS_STREET_2
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's mailing address street line 2.

columns.name: PHYS_ADDRESS_CITY
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's physical address city.

columns.name: MAIL_ADDRESS_CITY
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's mailing address city.

columns.name: MAIL_ADDRESS_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's mailing address state.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PHYS_ADDRESS_STATE_C_NAME

columns.name: MAIL_ADDRESS_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's mailing address county.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PHYS_ADDRESS_COUNTY_C_NAME

columns.name: MAIL_ADDRESS_ZIP
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's mailing address zip code.

columns.name: MAIL_ADDRESS_ZIP_EXT
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's mailing address zip code extension.

columns.name: WORK_PHONE_AREA_CODE
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's work phone number area code.

columns.name: WORK_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's work phone number without the area code.

columns.name: WORK_PHONE_EXTENSION
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's work phone number extension.

columns.name: HOME_PHONE_AREA_CODE
columns.description: It stores the area code from a dialysis patient's phone number.

columns.name: HOME_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's phone number.

columns.name: HOME_PHONE_EXTENSION
columns.description: It stores the phone number extension of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: FAX_PHONE_AREA_CODE
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's fax number area code.

columns.name: FAX_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's fax number without the area code.

columns.name: FAX_PHONE_EXTENSION
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's fax number extension.

columns.name: MOBILE_PHONE_AREA_CODE
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's mobile phone number area code piece.

columns.name: MOBILE_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's mobile phone number without the area code.

columns.name: PAGER_PHONE_AREA_CODE
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's pager number area code piece.

columns.name: PAGER_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's pager number without the area code.

columns.name: PAGER_PHONE_EXTENSION
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's pager number extension.

columns.name: OTHER_PHONE_AREA_CODE
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's other phone number area code.

columns.name: OTHER_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's other phone number without the area code.

columns.name: OTHER_PHONE_EXTENSION
columns.description: It indicates a dialysis patient's other phone number extension.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_ADDRESS_STREET_1
columns.description: It stores a transient dialysis patient's street address line 1.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_ADDRESS_STREET_2
columns.description: It stores a transient dialysis patient's street address line 2.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_ADDRESS_CITY
columns.description: It stores the city name of a dialysis patient's transient address.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_ADDRESS_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's transient address state.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PHYS_ADDRESS_STATE_C_NAME

columns.name: TRANSIENT_ADDRESS_ZIP
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's transient address ZIP code.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_ADDRESS_ZIP_EXT
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's transient address ZIP code extension.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_PHONE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a transient dialysis patient's preferred phone number type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Work


Tel


Fax


Mobile


Pager


Other

columns.name: TRANSIENT_PHONE_AREA_CODE
columns.description: It stores the area code from a transient dialysis patient's phone number.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: It stores the transient phone number of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_PHONE_EXTENSION
columns.description: It stores the extension from a dialysis patient's transient phone number.

columns.name: TRANSIENT_ADDRESS_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's transient address county.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PHYS_ADDRESS_COUNTY_C_NAME

columns.name: PAT_ETHNICITY_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the source of a dialysis patient's race and ethnicity information. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


SelfReported


NotSelfReported


FamilyReported


PatientDeclined

columns.name: PAT_CITIZENSHIP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the current citizenship status of a dialysis patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


USCitizen


NonUSCitizen


ForeignUsResident


USResident

columns.name: PAT_CITIZENSHIP_EFF_DATE
columns.description: It stores the effective date of the current citizenship status of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: PAT_HIC_NUM
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's Medicare health insurance claim number.

columns.name: PAT_TRIBE_CODE
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's tribe code.

columns.name: INVOLUNTARY_DISCH_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the reason of involuntary discharge for a dialysis patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Non-adherence


Verbal/written abuse


Verbal/written threat


Physical threat


Physical harm


Property damage/theft


Lack of payment

columns.name: DLYS_ABSTRACTION_PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the purpose of a patient's dialysis regulatory reporting form, such as an admission, a discharge, or a monthly submission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Monthly


Admission


Discharge


Transient Admission

columns.name: PAT_IN_NURSING_HOME_YN
columns.description:
It stores whether the dialysis patient was in a nursing home setting as of the end of the reporting period.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_TRANSIENT_YN

columns.name: DIALYSIS_NURSING_HOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the dialysis patient's nursing home setting.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Permanent Resident


Short Term Care/Rehabilitation


Other
